NL Question: What is the name of the source that was used to post the tweet with text 'RT @_TheRealDeal24: Crooked Hillary\'s ISIS scandal unveiled today, so tell me again how @realDonaldTrump is a bad choice.. I\'ll wait'?
Cypher: MATCH (t:Tweet {text: "RT @_TheRealDeal24: Crooked Hillary's ISIS scandal unveiled today, so tell me again how @realDonaldTrump is a bad choice.. I'll wait"})-[:POSTED_VIA]->(s:Source) RETURN s.name AS sourceName;
